Reviews.Title: Picture is Great, Sound is just OK
Reviews.Author: HR
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV and installed it on a kitchen wall about 15 feet away from my large Sony living room TV two weeks ago. The picture is great, but I would compare the sound to that of a radio, instead of a stereo. I have this TV running off of a splitter from my DVR that is connected to the Sony in the living room. When I have both of my TV's on at one time (which is a lot), I am mostly keeping the Vizio on mute. The sound of the two TV's on at one time seems distorted. The Sony sound is very rich, while the Vizio is not. I can understand why sound bars are a must with a lot of flat screens. This is a great auxilary TV for a bedroom, den, or kitchen. For less than $200, it's a good deal. When I am working in the kitchen and just have the Vizio sound on, it's acceptable, but still not the quality of my nine year old Sony.Programming tip: If you are going to connect it to a DVR, first disconnect the DVR and run your "in" cable directly to the TV (without the DVR in the loop). Go thru the initial channel programming and let it "auto run" to find the channels. When that is finished, then plug it into the DVR and it should be ready to go.

Reviews.Title: 5 star quality for the picture; 4 for the sound
Reviews.Author: Reginald D. Garrard "the G-man"
Reviews.Content: As indicated by the rating in the title, the television deserves a 4 1/2 assessment.  The picture is top-notch, making for a excellent visual experience.  I have it in my bedroom and the DVD's that I have watched on it exhibited superb color quality.As other reviewers have stated, the sound is a little "tinny" but that can be overlooked due to the outstanding picture.For the price, the convenience of the set-up, the easy-to-operate remote, this is a great buy and comes highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV for the bedroom, at a great price.
Reviews.Author: George Williams
Reviews.Content: I have this TV thanks to my co-workers with having a birthday club + after days of reviewing & actually going to see this and other HDTVs on display & after years on a standard resolution LCD TV, I went ahead and bought this.The LED/LCD factor + Price, made the difference with buying this .vs a Samsung or a Sony. This handles blacks & whites very well & overall picture is wonderful.I love the buttonless touch controls on the bezel & the many ports on the rear of the TV.My only dislike of this TV is the sound. I'm not an audiophile but if I had to toss a term, I'd say the sound was thin. The good news is, is you can toggle the settings just enough to get a good experience out of it, just not great.All in all, its a great HDTV, delivering a great 1080p experience, that is at a great price, without sucking up great power to do it.Buyer's remorse? None.

Reviews.Title: SUPER 22" LED LCD
Reviews.Author: Mr. E
Reviews.Content: This is a super 1080p 22" TV producing a great picture (high wow factor).  It's light wt, and has connectivity ports for about everything a person can imagine.  The sound suffers from the thin design but improves when sound can bounce off a wall or corner, etc.  If one turns off the SRS TruSound HD, the sound improves greatly.  I have it attached to a VideoSecu Articulating TV Wall Mount Bracket for VESA 100 LCD LED Flat Screen Monitor TV 1E9. The mount is super for a room like the kitchen where is gets use daily.  TV source is AT&T; U-verse.A great energy efficient HDTV system at a good price.  A winner for Visio.

Reviews.Title: If you looking for 22 vizio, read it.
Reviews.Author: Artur Sokolenko "Art BK"
Reviews.Content: Hello to all.I got my Vizio 22 Led TV E22MV yesterday from Ebay, used but pretty good cond for the price of 144$ can't find better.Anyways i was afraid that 22 inch wont be big enough, i was wrong, this is WIDE TV 21 in from right to left, not diagonal.Its for those of you who wants to know how wide is it.Anyways pic quality is very nice.Now SOUND : Who ever said that speakers are bad and you can't hear anything, my volume is on 3 right now i can hear fine, i don't even want to try to put it on 100, its going to be very loud.So don't listen those people who said sound is bad, its grate.And the last thing this TV only takes 12v of your power, very economical.So buy it and enjoy it like i do right now, don't be afraid of those reviews, may be people are deaf, you never know.

Reviews.Title: 1080p in a inexpensive package
Reviews.Author: Douglas R. Evans
Reviews.Content: The image quality of this Vizio is very good and it was nice to get 1080p in this small a monitor. Most of the others at this size only do 720p.

Reviews.Title: love this tv
Reviews.Author: P. Wells "Farmlady"
Reviews.Content: This tv was an excellent price and also is top quality.  Its picture quality is perfect and it is just the right size for the spot I needed it for in my kitchen. I will say that its sound quality is inferior to that of my larger tvs but I'm sure that is normal for all smaller tvs.

Reviews.Title: NICE TELEVISION
Reviews.Author: dark
Reviews.Content: These Vizio Razor televisions are the best in the industry.Not only do these sets have 1080P and Led last forever lighting, they also have SRS sound that lowers the volume for loud commercials and also has Dolby digital.Another feature is touch controls and a very thin profile.I now have two of these sets for my guest bedrooms.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality fuzzy picture and lousy sound.
Reviews.Author: Aussiegirl
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with this Television there were so many good reviews, I thought that perhaps the bad reviews were just bad luck for the purchaser. But after receiving this TV and setting it up no mater what I did I could not get a clear picture. The colors seemed to bleed it was either too red or too green. The sound was terrible, sort of wavering in and out. We have Verizon Fios so the poor picture quality was not due to a miss placed antenna. It was very blurry, I couldn't adjust the contrast or sharpness to clear it up. The 20 year old set that I was replacing had a better picture. So I gave up and sent it back to Amazon, kudos to Amazon for their 30 day return policy. I ordered the Panasonic Panasonic VIERA TC-L32C3 32-Inch 720p LCD HDTV and I am happy to say that it is great.

Reviews.Title: Nice Picture, Tinny Sound
Reviews.Author: Dan Zeitlin "Radio Addict"
Reviews.Content: This model was on sale at a local store at a very good price, so my wife and I went there and spent about 30 minutes with the set.  It's physically very clean and attractive.  The picture was quite good and there was a large range of adjustment that should suit most people.However, we I found the sound exceptionally tinny.  The audio settings in the menu allow only for a selection from several fixed presets labed "Jazz", "Classical", "Rock", etc.  There is no direct bass-treble adjustment or equalizer.  We tried all the audio settings and none of them fixed the tinny sound.  I'm guessing the built-in speakers are just too small and/or cheap.  In any event, the sound was a deal breaker for us.  I have no intention of buying speakers in addition to the TV.  I'd advise staying away from this model unless you already have or intend to add external speakers.FWIW, the best sound we found in the 19" and 22" TV sets in the store was in the JVC models. They sounded good and had a versatile set of adjustments in the sound menu.

Reviews.Title: Great potential, falls short
Reviews.Author: Jason P
Reviews.Content: I Purchased this set to do triple duty as a monitor, bedroom tv, and game console monitor.  On paper if fulfilled all requirements and had all necessary connectivity and then some.  Unpacking and assembly went smoothly and the design of the unit and base was great.  From this point forward the praise stops.  As stated in other reviews, the speakers had a tinny quality to them.  I can't expect much from a 22" TV/Monitor but I was underwhelmed.  When hooked up via HDMI to my game console there was a strange quality to the picture - it looked noisy or had artifact present.  The worst part was the light bleed at the edges.  Any medium-dark scene or darker had a 1" wide "bar" of light bleed.  It was there for games, television, dvd playback, or netflix.  For me that was the deal breaker and it went back.  I purchased a similarly sized Samsung edge lit set for $30 more and am much happier.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price, but a design flaw or two.
Reviews.Author: J. T. OBrien "MidnightJT0_v2"
Reviews.Content: I'm not going to give the long tech version of a review. Bought this to replace a computer screen and also connect DirecTv so it serves dual purpose in the family room. Video looks good for the size. Off-angle viewing isnt recommended unless the off angle is straight on high or low. If you're viewing from the side you'll be disappointed. Audio is good as well. Couple flaws would be that the TV doesn't always register a signal from the device if the TV is turned on after say the DirecTv box. Its annoying, but not a deal breaker. The on-screen / touch interface controls are a little awkward. Remote is the best way to control, but the last complaint I have is with the functionality of the remote. It's not an easy press, sometimes you have to consciously press hard in a certain area to get the key stroke in. Again, annoying but not a deal breaker. It serves the purpose at a great price. Definitely say I am considering a VIZIO for my next big screen purchase, but it's not automatic as Panasonic holds the crown in my house.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel Grier
Reviews.Content: My son bought this TV for his birthday and it's a great tv all around. The picture is nice and crisp, the size is great, the sound is good, and it has all the connections you can ask for in such a small TV. He plays Wii, PS2, and has his PC hooked up to it with no problems whatsoever. I will say the contrast ratio isn't stellar but again its to be expected on a TV this price. Overall extremely happy with the TV.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Picture
Reviews.Author: Steve G.
Reviews.Content: Ordered the Vizio to replace a bedroom TV stolen in a breakin. Great picture and sound. Easy setup. LED is the way to go. Well done Vizio!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful views
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Lynn Taylor
Reviews.Content: This T.V. has a wonderful screen with vivid color! It works great with my Apple T.V., and its hooked up to my stereo and that makes it even better!

Reviews.Title: Flat TV is great
Reviews.Author: Adrienne H. Jonas
Reviews.Content: I needed a new TV and saw the Vizeo at Costco - but bought it on line from Amazon - and I am thrilled with it - great picture, great sound - just wish it had a Sleep button and closed caption but doesn't seem to have either.  If it did it would be perfect!!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV with All the Inputs you need and other Great Surprises
Reviews.Author: Carguy100
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this TV and it's my first Vizio purchase.  It blows away the two similar sized Samsung TV/monitors that I already had.  Really nice features like the touch bezel controls so you don't have a bunch of buttons on the front.  Detailed menu system is very easy to navigate.  Picture is Fantastic!  Sound is very good I don't know why others complained about it?  A couple of minor issues like the lag between TV channel changes is a bit longer than I would like, remote sensor is on the lower right corner and didn't think my remote worked until I pointed it at the lower right corner.  Very well designed TV and even the packaging was really well done.  I was pleasantly surprised with my first Vizio purchase and will consider them for future purchases.  Glad I saved money and bought this TV/monitor.  Very crisp images on OTA TV, PC, HDMI, and even composite input.  Nice to see this one has composite and component inputs for some of your older gear.  USB Slideshow works really well and my Photos look awesome on it.  Would have been nice if they would have built mp3 sound into slideshow but I guess I'm being greedy now on a budget line product.  Kudos to Vizio on a stellar product. Styling is very nice looking and looks better than photos on site.  Very thin and easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: 22" vizo 1080p hdtv
Reviews.Author: Henry simon
Reviews.Content: I like this tv because its this wright for watchingmy football games its kind of like picture and picturein addition to that i use it as my camera monitor ipurchased this item at amazon.

Reviews.Title: Review of Vizio E220MV
Reviews.Author: Babs
Reviews.Content: Pleased with this TV. Easy to install. Picture quality is good. Only complaint is that the up and down channel indicator on the remote does not work.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: J. Thomas
Reviews.Content: Especially for the price, this is a nice TV. The controls are user friendly and the picture is great. It would get 5 stars from me if the internal speakers were better. Visio could do a much better job here; there are many adjustments for sound but the speakers themselves need more debth.

Reviews.Title: Good buy!
Reviews.Author: LXL
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv for grandpa and after setting it up for him, I was truly impressed with the picture quality.
